name: Real-time Neural Style Transfer
description: Experimenting with fast neural style transfer models for real-time video processing in the browser using WebGL shaders.

media.alt: Neural style transfer applied to webcam feed

results: Achieved 30fps processing on mid-range GPUs with acceptable quality trade-offs

name: Hand Gesture 3D Interface
description: Using MediaPipe and custom ML models to create gesture-controlled 3D interfaces that respond to hand movements.
results: Prototype working with 95% accuracy for 8 basic gestures

name: Procedural Terrain Generation
description: Exploring real-time procedural terrain generation using noise functions and GPU compute shaders.

media.alt: Wireframe view of procedurally generated terrain

name: Swarm Intelligence Simulation
description: Simulating swarm robotics behaviors using boids algorithm and emergent coordination patterns.

media.alt: Swarm of autonomous agents coordinating movement

results: Successfully demonstrated flocking, foraging, and formation behaviors with 1000+ agents
